title: #301 The Barreness (@FunnyLynne)
itunes:title: The Barreness with Lynne Koplitz
description: Lynne Koplitz had me over to her apartment to talk about menopause. She's deep into it and she was open about all of it. The hot flashes, the crankiness, the inability to breed. It was such a fun conversation that was MAYBE 20% on topic and the other 80% was just fun meanderings.
